channel.title: Anyone fluent in Flash 8 - CS3?
channel.description: How do I access all the actionscript present in a given .fla?

item.title: Anyone fluent in Flash 8 - CS3?

item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

Sorry, but I’m not really following.

If you mean you need to know the syntax and what the functions do, then I would be happy to help.

I use Flash 8 fairly often.

If I make no sense then I am very sorry to have wasted your time. But I think that is what you are getting at.

item.title: Anyone fluent in Flash 8 - CS3?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

unlimitedorb:

You might be able to pull off a memory hack then with a tool like CheatEngine, but upon examining the code that you posted in pastebin, it would only be an uphill struggle to develop anything remotely worthwhile without a solid knowledge of some programming language. The actionscript is very similar to most languages, so you don’t really have to know it that well, but it would be worthwhile to learn too.

No well I have a solid knowledge of PHP, which is similar in most cases to AS, except for it’s crappy OO support. I’ve modded other flash games, but I’m trying to figure out how to work this one out.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone fluent in Flash 8 - CS3?
item.dc:creator: @unlimitedorb unlimitedorb
item.description:
@unlimitedorb wrote:

private function encode(param1:ByteArray) : ByteArray { var _loc_2:ByteArray; var _loc_3:int; var _loc_4:int; _loc_2 = new ByteArray(); _loc_3 = 9999; _loc_2.writeBytes(param1, 0, _loc_3); _loc_4 = _loc_3; while (_loc_4--) { // label param1[_loc_4] = _loc_2[_loc_3-- - _loc_4]; }// end while return param1; }// end function
Looks to be your decoding function. A Java equivalent would be (I haven’t tested.):

[code]import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.File;

/**

  • A class to decode that flash game thing…

  • @author unlimitedorb
    */
    public class Crypt {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("");
    String line = “”;
    try {
    BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(
    new FileReader(new File(“temp.txt”)));
    while( (line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
    sb.append(line);
    }
    } catch(Exception e) {
    e.printStackTrace();
    }
    String result = decode(sb.toString().getBytes());
    //Better to delete the old, and output this as a new File, but whatever…
    System.out.println(result);
    }

    public static String decode(byte[] b) {
    byte[] b2;
    int count;
    int index;
    count = 9999;
    b2 = new byte[count];
    for(int i = 0; i <= 9999; i++)
    b2[i] = b[i];
    index = count;
    while ((index -= 1) >= 0)
    {
    b[index] = b2[count-- - index];
    }
    return new String(b);
    }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone fluent in Flash 8 - CS3?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

sanga282:

If you could downsload the actual .swf file i might be able to use my school’s flash 8 to get what you need

The actual .swf file I believe is http://chat.kongregate.com/gamez/0001/0110/live/pr2_loader.swf . It loads all the rest of the information from http://jiggmin4.com/games/PlatformRacing2/temp.txt and unencrypts it and runs it, I’m assuming.
